## Checklist

- [ ] Tests pass locally (`pytest nocodb/ -v`)
- [ ] Added/updated tests for code changes
- [ ] Updated docs if needed (README.md, CLAUDE.md, skill.md)
- [ ] Commit message follows `type(scope): description` format
- [ ] PR is focused on ONE change (no bundled unrelated changes)

## First-Time Contributor?

If this is your first PR to this project:

- [ ] I confirm this PR changes **5 or fewer files** (excluding tests/docs)
- [ ] I confirm this PR changes **200 or fewer lines** (excluding tests/docs)

> Tests (`*_test.py`) and documentation (`*.md`) don't count toward limits.
> PRs from first-time contributors that exceed these limits will be closed automatically.
> See [CONTRIBUTING.md](../CONTRIBUTING.md) for details.
